data.title: Chic and Urban Bar
data.text: Uniquely designed bar (urban outfitters style) with fun and friendly design. Bar is cute, and the tables enable strangers to mingle. V chic and open/friendly. We went during the international arts fest and it was a lot of fun. Definitely will return.

data.title: Bachelorette Pub Crawl
data.text: This was the last stop on our bachelorette pub crawl and it was great.  No cover charge . . . ever, per staff.  The ping-pong tables and arcades games were great for my group.  The downstairs scene was a bit dark, so we quickly marched back upstairs, and stayed there for the rest of the night.   Many shots were done, I recommend the iced tea shot and the pickle back - tastes better than it sounds.
